channel.title: Text Analysis on The Gauntlet: An R Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Text Analysis on The Gauntlet: An R Blog

item.title: Kara ❤️ Elon
item.description: Intro Kara loves to talk about Elon Musk. A couple of friends asked me how often I thought Kara directly mentions/talks about Elon Musk This is my attempt to quantify that. Method The data used for this was copied directly from the Apple Podcast App website. I only use show note descriptions so any reference to Elon in a podcast but not in the show notes will not be counted.
